name: Baked Chicken Thighs With Mushroom Brown Rice
author: trishthedish617
summary: This easy and delicious one-pan meal that's easy on the budget can also be made with white rice.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained and liquid reserved
4  chicken thighs with skin and bones
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Combine mushrooms, celery, onion, rice, and garlic in an ungreased 10-inch baking dish
Sprinkle thyme, poultry seasoning, salt, and pepper on top
Add enough water to reserved mushroom liquid to measure 3/4 cup and pour over rice mixture in the baking dish
Place chicken on top, skin-side up
Brush with olive oil and season with salt and pepper to taste
Cover baking dish tightly with aluminum foil
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour
Remove aluminum foil and bake until skin is browned to your preference, 30 to 45 minutes more
